title: Death Stranding Director's Cut Reviews Are Divisive - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.23.21
description:
Tam and Tim go over the Death Stranding Director's Cut reviews, SEGA closing its arcade, the future of Titanfall, the Nintendo Direct, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
September 23 1889: Nintendo Koppai (Later Nintendo Company, Limited) founded by Fusajiro Yamauchi to produce and market the playing card game Hanafuda
00:04:15 - Housekeeping
It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Thursday, which is TODAY, we’re playing World War Z: Aftermath for a sponsored stream. You can shamble on over at 11 am PT right after this very episode of Kinda Funny Games Daily to see Greg, Mike, Andy, and Blessing blast some zombies. If you miss it live, it’ll be on the youtube channel youtube.com/kindafunnyplays after!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:06:35 - Death Stranding Director’s Cut Reviews
00:15:58 - Titanfall 3 Isn't Coming Anytime Soon, Respawn Says - GameSpot.com, Otty Kratky
00:25:20 - New Disney Classic Games Collection officially adds SNES Aladdin and Jungle Book - VGC, Tom Ivan
00:29:15 - New Kirby Game Seemingly Leaked Ahead of Nintendo Direct -- IGN, Joe Skrebels
00:33:00 - Fans Gather To Say Goodbye To A Legendary Sega Arcade -- Kotaku, Brain Ashcraft
00:44:15 - Out today
00:41:00 - Ad
 Reader mail  -
00:48:30 - Is there any hope that we’ll get an N64 classic this holiday? - BrentWHAT
00:56:35 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
